DocAttribute.Name: MeshLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: The overall length of the mesh measured in its longitudinal direction.

DocAttribute.Name: MeshWidth
DocAttribute.Documentation: The overall width of the mesh measured in its transversal direction.

DocAttribute.Name: LongitudinalBarNominalDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal diameter denoting the cross-section size of the longitudinal bars.

DocAttribute.Name: TransverseBarNominalDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal diameter denoting the cross-section size of the transverse bars.

DocAttribute.Name: LongitudinalBarCrossSectionArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The effective cross-section area of the longitudinal bars of the mesh.

DocAttribute.Name: TransverseBarCrossSectionArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The effective cross-section area of the transverse bars of the mesh.

DocAttribute.Name: LongitudinalBarSpacing
DocAttribute.Documentation: The spacing between the longitudinal bars. Note: an even distribution of bars is presumed; other cases are handled by classification or property sets.

DocAttribute.Name: TransverseBarSpacing
DocAttribute.Documentation: The spacing between the transverse bars. Note: an even distribution of bars is presumed; other cases are handled by classification or property sets.

DocAttribute.Name: BendingShapeCode
DocAttribute.Documentation: If this mesh type is bent rather than planar, this attribute provides a shape code per a standard like ACI 315, ISO 3766, or a similar standard. It is presumed that a single standard for defining the mesh bending is used throughout the project and that this standard is referenced from the _IfcProject_ object through the _IfcDocumentReference_ mechanism.

DocAttribute.Name: BendingParameters
DocAttribute.Documentation: If this mesh type is bent rather than planar, this attribute provides bending shape parameters. Their meaning is defined by the bending shape code and the respective standard.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The inherited attribute _ElementType_ shall be provided if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: BendingShapeCodeProvided
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Bending parameters must be accompanied by a shape code.
